Class DirectDataSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.smooks.engine.db.AbstractDataSource
      • org.smooks.engine.db.DirectDataSource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ContentHandler, Producer, ExecutionLifecycleCleanable, VisitLifecycleCleanable, DOMVisitBefore, DOMVisitor, BeforeVisitor, SaxNgVisitor, SAXVisitBefore, SAXVisitor, Visitor

    public class DirectDataSource
extends AbstractDataSource
    Direct DataSource.

    Configured with a specific JDBC driver plus username etc.

    Author:
    tom.fennelly@gmail.com
